summary: An ordinance approving the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2269, for the improvement of 25th Avenue Northwest and 26th Avenue Northwest, each from West 70th Street to West 75th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 23436 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
